title: need a game help asap
body: ok so i was playing a game of aram and we won the game i clicked to get out of the game and when i did it took me to the main menu when i went to go in que for another game it came up with error account already in game so i logged off and then relogged back on and now im stuck with the reconnect screen and every time i try to reconnect it comes up with an error msg telling me to retry and connect again

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is called a Ghost Game, these usually occur when there are server issues and the game doesn't correctly report as completed.

These usually resolve themselves within a few hours, Judging from the time of your post, this should've been resolved by now.

if you're still experiencing this issue now, please let me know.
